title: Server Connection Issues (LeaverBuster)
body: So, what I find frustrating is that there are known issues with connecting to the server once loading in game. Sometimes I have to reconnect and it works fine other times I try to reconnect and by that time the game is remade and I get leaver buster. I am now on 10 minute wait for 5 games due to League of Legends connection to servers. Wouldn't it make sense if you turn off leaver buster until you fix your video game? This is the second time in two days I got a buster because I literally couldn't connect.....am I missing the logic here?

replies.body: seriously though i got leaver bustered for 20 minutes 5 games. and after I finished those games it happened AGAIN and guess what was MY CONCEQUENCE
Same exact thing happened to me.

So I put a ticket in and they responded with a bot pretty fast. They allowing me to review my account. I just gotta download this thing that will give them info about my connections and so forth. Send a ticket in if you need help lmk{{champion:201}}

Dude, don't you know Riot is too busy making the winter map and a new lux skin??!?! They don't have time to waste on problems like "fixing the game" cmon' dude, it's not like they're making millions to fix these kind of irrelevant issues. think sometimes before you make a post like this idiot.

This known issue you're referring to only affects the **first connection attempt**. This is a bug, it is **not** a server issue and will not cause continuous connection issues, which means any continuous issues are completely unrelated.

Since you're seeing intermittent issues, I'm suspecting there are local issues on your network and I'd recommend taking a swing at the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know if those steps caused any change for you.
